author: Gina Kolata
title: Could you be a coronavirus superspreader? And why are some of us so infectious?
description: It’s just as important to identify people who are infected but unlikely to spread Covid-19
content: As coronavirus continues to tear around the world, scientists are asking: Are some people more infectious than others? Are there superspreaders, people who seem to just spew out virus, making them especially likely to infect others? It seems that the answer i… [+7540 chars]
